comments: First half is material, second half is research methods. Very interesting course, lots of important materials discussed.

Great opportunity to pursue an independent project. Never thought I'd love studying urban sociology but this class helped me see parts that I think I would love to continue to study at the graduate level. Jessica is leaving and going across the river, but if anyone picks this up with even half the expertise, I highly recommend. Seek out help with analysis/final paper portion early and often if this is offered again.
